customHeadContent:
<style>
  .hidden{
   display:none; 
  }
</style>
<script>
function completeTableChange(){
  K('field[Family Member]').value("");
  K('field[Programs]').value("");
  K('field[tableMemberID]').value("");
  K('field[tableMemberName]').value("");
  K('field[tableProgram]').value("");
  K('field[tableFee]').value("");
  
  // Sort table
  viewerConfig.response.sort(function(a, b){return b.cost - a.cost});
  // Let calculate the discounts
  viewerConfig.response.forEach(function(item, index){
    if (index===0){
      item.discount="0%";
      item.fee=((new Number(item.cost))).toFixed(2);
    } else if(index===1){
      item.discount="10%";
      item.fee=((new Number(item.cost))*0.9).toFixed(2);
    } else if(index===2){
      item.discount="20%";
      item.fee=((new Number(item.cost))*0.8).toFixed(2);
    } else if(index>=3){
      item.discount="30%";
      item.fee=((new Number(item.cost))*0.7).toFixed(2);
    }      
  });
  
  // Set payment value
  var total=0;
  viewerConfig.response.forEach(function(item, index){
		total=total+(new Number((new Number(item.fee)).toFixed(2)));
  });
  K('field[I promise to pay equal FREQUENCY instalments of]').value(total);

  global.viewerConfig.renderer.type($('#memberTableDiv'),global.viewerConfig);

  $('#member-table tbody tr').on( 'click', function () {
    if ( $(this).hasClass('selected') ) {
      $(this).removeClass('selected');
    }
    else {
      $('#member-table').DataTable().$('tr.selected').removeClass('selected');
      $(this).addClass('selected');
    }
  } );  
  
}  
  
function memberProgramAdded(memberID, feeProgram) {
  found=false;

  viewerConfig.response.forEach(function(item){
      if (item.id===memberID && item.feeProgram===feeProgram) {
        found=true;
      }
  });  
  return found;
}
</script>
description: Member payment registration form. Use to initiate a scheduled payment or alter an existing schedule of payments.
name: PaySmart Member Registration

elements.name: The first instalment is due on HTML
The first instalment is due on
elements.label: to . The first instalment is due on

elements.name: Payment information description
elements.text: and subsequent instalments are to be paid each fortnight afterwards until I give notice that I wish to stop payments according to the terms and conditions including cancellation and membership freeze terms below.

elements.name: Terms Information
elements.text:
You hereby agree not to cancel of debit authority via your bank account or credit card for any reason and any debts owing to

You may cancel this contract if you (1) relocate your residence further than 20km from any school operated by Gracie Barra; (2) medical condition, being a permanent disability that will not allow the practice of BJJ for a considerable time (at least one year); (3) deployment in the case the student is military; (4) unexpected unemployment.

For any cancellation request, the appropriate document must be provided:

* Change of Address: bill or lease agreement for the new address;
* Medical Condition: doctor's letter proving the permanent disability;
* Document proving deployment;
* Document proving the person lost the job;

Students who would like to cancel without reason must give 60 day's written notice.

Cancellation requests must be in person or via email sent to info@gbsydney.com.au with any appropriate documentation. Requests will be reviewed and responded to within three business days.

Students enrolled in the Future Champions Programs can cancel their agreement for any reason upon delivery of 60 days written cancellation notice to the school.

* Gracie Barra reserves the right to alter the days, hours of operation and classes if deemed necessary to better fit the student's needs.

* The student and co-signer agree unconditionally to pay the above tuition without regard to the attendance made or classes missed.

* Gracie Barra reserves the right to use any images, video footage and conduct interviews from Gracie Barra students. By signing this form you hereby grant Gracie Barra permission to use and or publish through any marketing channels.

* The student consents to Gracie Barra collecting and using their personal information provided it is only used for the purposes of the proper running of the Gracie Barra business and will not be disclosed to third parties unless required by law.

Note: This agreement is non-refundable.
